JOIN US AT THE ALLEY!
Located in downtown historic Boynton Beach Florida, just steps from the local marina where U Hook 'em - We Cook 'em!  Featuring oversized sandwiches, crisp salads, fresh seafood and a great raw bar.  Where locals go to get away from it all and
GET BLOWN AWAY!
HOURS OF OPERATION:
LUNCH & DINNER HOURS:
Tuesday - Sunday: 11am - 10pm
(Closed on Mondays)

(561) 364-4083 (Office)

LOCATION:
529 East Ocean Ave.
Boynton Beach, FL 33435

Press Release
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Hurricane Alley Raw Bar and Restaurant Receives 2020 Best of Boynton Beach Award
Boynton Beach Award Program Honors the Achievement
BOYNTON BEACH February 13, 2020 -- Hurricane Alley Raw Bar and Restaurant has been selected for the 2020 Best of Boynton Beach Award in the Local Business category by the Boynton Beach Award Program.
Each year, the Boynton Beach Award Program identifies companies that we believe have achieved exceptional marketing success in their local community and business category. These are local companies that enhance the positive image of small business through service to their customers and our community. These exceptional companies help make the Boynton Beach area a great place to live, work and play.
Various sources of information were gathered and analyzed to choose the winners in each category. The 2020 Boynton Beach Award Program focuses on quality, not quantity. Winners are determined based on the information gathered both internally by the Boynton Beach Award Program and data provided by third parties.
About Boynton Beach Award Program
The Boynton Beach Award Program is an annual awards program honoring the achievements and accomplishments of local businesses throughout the Boynton Beach area. Recognition is given to those companies that have shown the ability to use their best practices and implemented programs to generate competitive advantages and long-term value.
The Boynton Beach Award Program was established to recognize the best of local businesses in our community. Our organization works exclusively with local business owners, trade groups, professional associations and other business advertising and marketing groups. Our mission is to recognize the small business community's contributions to the U.S. economy.
SOURCE: Boynton Beach Award Program
CONTACT:
Boynton Beach Award Program
Email: PublicRelations@2020-townrankingcontact.com
URL: http://www.2020-townrankingcontact.com
